title: Angela's Experience
description: I designed and developed this game using PixiJS when I was working with the Changeling team to help promote their VR game built on Unreal engine called Changeling. The purpose of the game is to let the players feel related to one of the main character Angela by experiencing a day of her life. The Angela's art and the background art were also created by myslef using Clip Studio Paint.

title: Text-based RPG Game
description: A web app for people who are interested in chatting with themselves. They can take on different roles and send messages in different settings, like library, meeting room, etc. More features like creating your own roles, places, and customizing profile pictures for each role are under construction.

title: Dog Lover
description: A project developed using dog API. You can search for a breed by entering its name in the search bar or click a breed from the breed list. You can also choose the number of results you'd like to see (between 1-50). Save your favorites by pressing the heart button on the top right of an image and see what you've saved in Favorites.

title: Client's Personal Website
description: This is a personal website built for a game developer to showcase their projects and accomplishments.

title: Nick Cage Clicker
description: A clicker game developed using HTML canvas and JavaScript, and styled using CSS and Bulma. You can go to the home page to see instructions for the game.

title: Coffee Finder
description: An application that helps you explore different places to get coffee on RIT campus. You can choose different views depended on your preference.
